title: Crockpot Expectations
itunes:summary:
Some things in life take time. For blended families, the challenges may be difficult, but it's possible to make it work with God's help. John, Erin and Greg offer hope to those in blended families who are wondering if their relationship can thrive. Featuring Dr. Gary Chapman and Mr. Ron Deal.


Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY


Receive the book "Building Love Together in Blended Families" for your donation of any amount! https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-09-13?refcd=1468603


Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/crockpot-expectations/#featured-resource-cta


Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/simple-habits-to-embrace-in-your-marriage-digital-download/?refcd=1460508


If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
